About Me

Let me tell you a few things...

BIO

As a driven and tech-savvy Web Developer, I have always had a strong gravitational pull towards technology. I have worked in UX/UI design for several years and I am currently pursuing an intensive Web Development Coding Certification at the University of Pennsylvania. I am adding to my experience in web development while honing my skills in HTML5, CCS, Bootstrap, and Javascript. Having an appetite for continuous learning, collaboration, and problem-solving, I plan to create and maintain websites, while also developing iOS & Android apps. Equally passionate about building applications that assist everyday people to make their lives easier. Looking to bring my attention to detail and technical skills to a company to grow and become a valuable asset.
